works.description:
Review:
Silent Screen - an ultimate “deploy-and-forget” spying tool.
Although espionage and eavesdropping are generally considered inacceptable forms of behavior, they are often absolutely necessary for preventing worse things from happening. Spying can be used for a number of purposes: from monitoring your employees’ activities to controlling your children’s Internet browsing and online communications, from preventing unauthorized access to your computer to verifying your partner’s loyalty and many more. If you are not a computer guru and don’t want to spend an eternity learning the nuts and bolts of network protocols, kernel-level logging and such, just use a ready commercial tool, such as Silent Screen. 

   Silent Screen is an ultimate spying tool that is easy to install and a real snap to use. Once installed on the target computer, it gives you a clear picture of the actions performed by the remote user. You can see the addresses of visited websites, read every incoming or outgoing email, record every single keystroke made on the user’s keyboard, intercept IM messages, capture screenshots at regular intervals and even have the program automatically upload the logs to a remote FTP server. The software works in the stealth mode and can hardly be detected even by experienced users. The administrative part of Silent Screen is reliably protected by a password, so nobody will be able to disable it, except you. 

   If you feel that learning a bit more about others can prevent worse things from happening or confirm your suspicions, try Silent Screen. This affordable and highly efficient tool will make sure there are no secrets remaining!
